sub_fields.label: Note on Hidden Map
sub_fields.message: When maps are off, they are removed from the frontend but you can still access the map tools on the backend.  The maps menu and options will still show in the backend of the site and quests can still be assigned to a map chain.

sub_fields.label: Bankruptcy Penalty
sub_fields.name: bankruptcy_penalty
sub_fields.instructions: Reputation lost if a player does not have enough gold to cover an undo or penalty (they spent the gold received already).

fields.label: Levels

sub_fields.label: Growth Rate
sub_fields.name: growth
sub_fields.instructions: This will auto increment new rows added by this multiplier. The higher the multiplier the more difficult the high levels will be obtain.

sub_fields.label: First Level Up
sub_fields.name: go_first_level_up
sub_fields.instructions: This is used to calculate new rows below.

sub_fields.label: Max Amount to Level Up
sub_fields.name: max
sub_fields.instructions: Limits the maximum amount between levels when adding new levels.

sub_fields.label: Award Badge
sub_fields.name: award_badge
sub_fields.instructions: Optionally award badge on reaching this level.
